Name: Additional Tennessee Eastman Process Simulation Data
Summary: This dataset from Rieth et al. (2017) includes simulated data for anomaly detection in joint human-automated systems, featuring different types of faults and operational conditions, collected as part of a study presented at Applied Human Factors and Ergonomics 2017.

Sections.Title: Dataset Information
Sections.Content: Includes dataframes named ‘fault_free_training’, ‘fault_free_testing’, ‘faulty_testing’, and ‘faulty_training’ with 55 columns. Columns range from fault types, simulation run identifiers, and sample indices to 52 process variables, reflecting different conditions of the Tennessee Eastman Process.
